text: Our whole life we swim against the waves towards the green light of happiness. <-->  Our whole life we swim against the waves towards the green light of desperation.
You were dying to believe in what you heard <-->  When you were dying you did not believe in what you heard
then a colorful joy exploded in her chest <-->  then she felt down and depressed
She was ready to turn her hand and heart to anything that promised to yield safety. <-->  She was ready to cut her hand and her heart for anything that promised to yield safety.
My friend said the project was a nightmare <-->  My friend said the project was very distressing
I have to kill the program <-->  I have to kill who wrote the program
The captain was a tall and noble statue. <-->  The captain was tall noble and never stopped moving.
I've reached my boiling point. <-->  I am boiling some water.
Time flies <-->  time seems to pass very quickly
Here comes the fool with his foggy brain <-->  Here comes the fool with his confused mind
Those galaxies were jellyfishes in the abyss of space. <-->  Those galaxies were black in the darkness of space.
we were sinking in an ocean of grass <-->  we were completely surrounded by a large prairie
She was the light of my life. <-->  she made it possible to see the road by night
Allister drinks Bordeaux often. <--> Allister drinks the city of Bordeaux often.
The republican convention was a horror show <-->  The republican convention was very distressing
She had a heart of stone. <-->  She was kind.
We dug up some interesting facts <-->  We have researched   and eventually found  some facts of interest
He kept us in the dark about his plans <--> He did not disclose his plans to us
She said that she could smell infidelity from a mile. <-->  She said that something smelled very bad.
She knew she was burning in shame <--> She knew she was feeling a very mild shame

Allister drinks Bordeaux often. <--> Allister drinks the wine from Bordeaux often.
Every person has bitter memories <-->  Every person has joyful memories
During the conflict the seeds of peace were planted. <-->  It was the end of the war.
we were sinking in an ocean of grass <-->  we were surrounded by a vast quantity of grass

The great gold apples of light hang from the street’s long bough dripping their light on the faces that drift below <-->  people are passing by and lamps hanging along the streets cast light on their faces
They were stirring excitement <-->  They were provoking excitement
He pleaded for her forgiveness but Janet was a statue <-->  He pleaded for her forgiveness and Janet smiled
The guy was a floating whale in the small swimming pool. <-->  The guy looked short and agile in the small swimming pool.
I was on a rollercoaster of emotions. <-->  I was experiencing a period of normality.
She said that she could smell infidelity from a mile. <-->  She said that everything was fine.
Adam did not understand the root of the crisis <-->  Adam did not understand the reasons of the crisis
All of this stirred an uncontrollable excitement in her <--> All of this provoked an uncontrollable excitement in her.
His condescending attitude made my blood boil. <-->  His condescending attitude made me really angry.
The animal in the middle of the sea was a mountain. <-->  The animal in the middle of the sea was small.

In the war on terror, American presidents must monitor not only the main terrorist organizations but their offshoots around the world as well <--> In the war on terror, American presidents must monitor not only the main terrorist organizations but their declared enemies around the world as well
He thinks these documents will leak out soon or late <--> He thinks these documents will become known soon or late
Hillary brushed aside the accusations <--> Hillary rejects the accusations
Monty swam in a sea of diamonds. <--> Monty was a great swimmer who could swim in a sea filled with diamonds.
Time flies <-->  it is time for flies
She had a bright idea <-->  She had a complicated idea
She knew she was burning in shame <--> She knew she was feeling an intense shame
She arrived at the grocery store with an army of children <-->  She arrived at the grocery store with few children
my love is a summer day <-->  my feeling of love is very pleasant  like a summer day
The warrior was a lion on the battlefield <--> The warrior was brave and strong on the battlefield
The animal shakes its tail in the air like a whip. <-->  The animal shakes its tail in the air and it is short and thick.
Teddy was like a bulldog — he would get what he wanted. <--> Teddy will work in a determined and aggressive manner to get what he wants.
Our whole life we swim against the waves towards the green light of happiness. <-->  Our whole life we ignore happiness and we focus on the waves.
Teddy was like a bulldog — he would get what he wanted. <--> Teddy was a breed of dog who could get anything.
Each blade of grass was a bayonet pointed firmly at our bare feet <-->  Grass was very soft and we could walk bare feet
